name: es-pack-js
description: Build and test portable JavaScript/rustwasm modules

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser && npm run test:verify && npm run test:ex
scripts.test:verify: npm run test:verify:base && npm run test:verify:hoge && npm run test:verify:babel && npm run test:verify:update && npm run test:verify:units
scripts.test:ex: npm run test:ex:base && npm run test:ex:hoge && npm run test:ex:babel && npm run test:ex:meta && npm run test:ex:rustwasm-add && npm run test:ex:rustwasm-ffi
scripts.test:verify:base: bin/es-pack build examples/base -m umd esm esm-compat --verify
scripts.test:verify:hoge: bin/es-pack build examples/externals-hoge -m umd esm esm-compat --verify
scripts.test:verify:babel: bin/es-pack build examples/externals-babel -m umd esm esm-compat --verify
scripts.test:verify:update: bin/es-pack build examples/extconfig-update -m umd esm esm-compat --verify
scripts.test:ex:meta: bin/es-pack build examples/meta -m umd esm esm-compat && bin/es-pack test examples/meta --node --browser
scripts.test:windows: bin/es-pack build examples/meta -m umd esm esm-compat && jest -c jest.config.js --rootDir examples/meta && jest -c jest.config.browser.js --rootDir examples/meta

author: j-devel
